transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello


Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Haan namaste namaste boliye.
Customer: Wo kal WhatsApp se baat hui thi na aapki video meeting ke liye to join kar lenge ki aap?
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai main abhi paanch minute mein aapko message karta hoon. Theek hai. Gautam sir ko main bol ke phir join karta hoon saath mein.
Executive: Haan haan main aap 20 minute ke baad kariye main pahunch jata hoon office.
Executive: Main office se bahar hoon.
Executive: Haan 20 minute baat kariye main office pahunch jaunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked about joining the video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive said to call after 20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will join the meeting after 20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, follow up, joining
